alert.note: Alert for Dent; Phelps; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 3:33PM CDT until May 19 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SHANNON...DENT...EASTERN TEXAS AND PHELPS COUNTIES... At 333 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of St. James to 9 miles east of Salem to 17 miles west of Bunker to near Summersville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Rolla... Current River State Park... Echo Bluff State Park... Montauk State Park... Ozark National Scenic Riverways... Salem... St. James... Licking... Doolittle... Newburg... Bunker... Raymondville... Edgar Springs... Lenox... Montauk... Jadwin... Howes Mill... Lake Spring... Gladden... Eunice... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 171 and 200. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central, central and east central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
